clean_data: Founder Founder Founder Work of Merit Austin TX Im an experienced Full Stack Developer living and working in Austin Texas Over the years I have built and maintained web projects for Design Marketing and Advertising agencies in Austin including my own and have won a few awards in doing so I characterize myself as being a handson resultsdriven leader in my field with emphasis on precision and newbutstable open web technologies I have extensive experience with website development eCommerce complete SEO marketing automation tools and website performance optimization Some of the brands I have had the privilege to serve include 3M Shell Honeywell Subway San Antonio Tourism Travel Texas St Davids Foundation and Downtown Austin Alliance Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Founder Work of Merit April 2019 to Present Work of Merit is a sole proprietorship I started in April 2019 to put more focus on the quality of fewer offerings Work of Merit primarily provides technical services to creative and marketing industries Using WordPress as the primary web content platform I build awardwinning websites that engage marketing websites that convert and web solutions that connect Director Technology Seventh Scout April 2017 to April 2019 As Cofounder of a Digital Marketing agency my responsibilities ranged from defining business processes proposal writing developing partnerships and managing operations to making personnel decisions refine workflow processes mentoring interns and building awardwinning website experiences Lead Front End Developer Endurance International Group July 2016 to July 2017 Primarily worked on the Marketing Kanban board with the overarching goal to move decadesold brands to a unified CMS platform while actively managing and delivering on the daytoday objectives Responsibilities included creating and moving Stories code reviews visual reviews coordinating and performing code launches My immediate team consisted of 8 Engineers who I communicated with daily helped to navigate technical issues and led to deliver in excellence Lead Front End Engineer Software Advice October 2015 to July 2016 A very handson lead role that involved helping other engineers with front end coding issues supporting the online needs of other departments and contributing to the design and prototype phase of each project Other aspects of the job included exploring new technologies for webbased software and substantiating change for new implementations Sr Front End Developer Proof Advertising February 2012 to October 2015 Proof offered me creative and technical freedom with a proportionate amount of accountability Responsibilities included scoping developing and maintaining client projects This included working with Creatives to optimize web UIs and push for the best UX in every project managing email marketing software coordinating efforts with Senior Management and communicating directly with our 3rdparty vendors EXPERIENCE Continued Freelance Web Consultant Developer FreelanceSelf employed November 2009 to February 2012 Working with a network of designers and developers I focused on delivering only highquality projects to meet and exceed client expectations The production aspect of my work included building highlycustomized Wordpress websites brochure sites databasedriven product catalogs eCommerce implementations and SEO consulting The management aspect included leading discovery meetings coordinating website design and outsourcing creative services Web Developer Behavioral Science Technology July 2007 to November 2009 Played a pivotal role in BSTs Marketing department to successfully design launch and maintain several multilanguage websites to represent BSTs global presence This included constructing wireframes fully designed comps modular web templates Flash apps online payment integration pulling reports and collaborating with team members around the world Presentation Layer Developer Avenue A Razorfish October 2006 to March 2007 Responsibilities included making decisions about the technologies used on projects connecting to databases from the front end prepping graphics and multimedia development During this time I had the opportunity to produce very highlevel engaging web products for popular commercial brands Worked with HTML CSS Javascript Dreamweaver
